entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 15 except 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Periods of rain beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 this afternoon. High 15 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
